reviews.review_msg: Great prof, really cares about her students and teaching them until they get it. Pay attention in class, dont slack, and try your best. She will reward you with a nice grade if you do this. Andale!

Be honest, she is great! But she is way too demanding. Her computer quizzes can drive you crazy at the end. But, she is a super "grade-A" teacher with a good heart unlike someone in her next door office. and you know who.... hahaha  We even had dinner with her at the end of this semester.
Not very hard but I didn't like her teaching style.  quizzes are  sometimes hard. it won't be too hard to at least get a B for the course.
Really good prof. I like how she encourages class discussion rather than just doing excercises from the text. Most of the time class goes by really quickly, and is pretty fun!
Good class, a little challenging because she explains almost everything in Spanish. As long as you study you will do fine on tests. She has a good sense of humor so she keeps the class fun.
This class was pretty fun. Interactive. I'd recommend it, Isabel is great also.

Easy going mexican teacher. extreme online activities with enough time.exams are between fair and hard.she encourages you to speak in class.she doesn't give you hard time during lectures which is important.
